entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Light snow and local blowing snow beginning after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
